response.job_title: B2B Sales | Sales Management | Partnerships | Business Development | Sales Manager
response.summary: Bilingual Chemical Engineer (Spanish / English), Master in Marketing Management and Commercial Management, with experience leading B2B commercial projects and strategic client development. Able to lead, plan and execute a plan to open national and foreign markets; development of methodologies focused on increasing portfolios with key clients. Analysis, diagnosis and characterization of improvement opportunities for internal and external clients. Management development with strategic thinking, planning, resource optimization and team development.
response.skills: Resolución de problemas, Consultoría de estrategia, Comunicación, Dirección y desarrollo de equipos de trabajo, Startup, Strategic partnerships, Negotiation, Estrategia de ventas, Strategic Planning, Project Management, Manufacturing, Plastics, Ingeniería, Ingeniería de procesos, Engineering, Business Strategy, Investigación y desarrollo, Estrategia empresarial, Desarrollo de productos, Planificación estratégica

profile_positions.description:
Lead and build the partnerships team, focusing on developing a new lending channel. Develop commercial strategies to close new strategic partnerships that increase the number of credits placed and portfolio. Direct relationship with c-levels, developing the whole sales cycle on developing the new partnerships, from prospection to closure. 
Responsible of planning and executing of an annual budget of 6 million dollars.

Achievements:
•	Leading the construction and launching of Avista Club, which is a benefit club for clients, in order to increase retention and conversion.
profile_positions.title: Head of Strategic Partnership

profile_positions.description:
Design and develop commercial, operative and marketing strategies focused on reaching a monthly increase of 10%. I was in charge of the relationship with Colombia’s top sellers allies and the top 3 Latam corporate account. Consulting for the continuous improvement for brand construction in Rappi and improving sales. Daily follow up of the results on the strategies on course.
Presentation and preparation of weekly and monthly sales and operations executive reports. Assigned annual budget of 20 million dollars. Captain of the development and prioritization of operational integrations.

Achievements:
•	Renegotiated commercial agreements, generating savings of over 300 million pesos per month.
•	I designed and executed a plan to improve the portfolio's operating score above 50%.
profile_positions.title: Senior Sales Manager | AGM

profile_positions.description: Analysis and development of commercial strategies focused on closing B2B customers. Responsible of managing a strategic portfolio of clients in Colombia. Budget and forecast building. Managing the sales cycle from prospecting to closing, primarily with C-Levels. Presentation and preparation of executive reports. Design and development of schedules and indicators.
profile_positions.title: Key Account Manager

profile_positions.description:
Gestión y control de clientes estratégicos B2B en Colombia, Ecuador, Trinidad, Guyana, Marruecos, Egipto y Argelia. Consolidación de los portafolios de cada cliente. Cierre de negociaciones de cantidad, precio y entregas. Conocimiento avanzado de especificaciones de materiales. Levantamiento de información del mercado y análisis de costos. Desarrollo de las cotizaciones de todas las licitaciones. Responsable de un presupuesto anual superior a 25 mil millones de pesos.

Logros: 
- Aumento de facturación en un 60% de los clientes tipo A asignados.
- Liderar y ejecutar proyecto de apertura de mercado en África.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative

education.field_of_study: Habilidades sociales y para los negocios

company.name: Rappi
company.description:
Rappi is a Latin-American company and the first SuperApp in the region. 

It was founded in 2015 by Simón Borrero, Sebastian Mejía, and Felipe Villamarin and today is present in 9 countries and more than 200 cities.

We are a young Latin American team of technology entrepreneurs with a mission to drive progress in our region through our platform for digital commerce. 

We know the future of Latin America can be made far brighter with technology that connects people to solutions. For us, Rappi is not just a company… it’s a movement for economic progress.
